sys_script_include.name: Utils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_01e139acfb05da5048a7f92abeefdce8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_tipts_scc_integr.Utils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Utils</name><script><![CDATA[const Utils = {

    isInboundAPIEnabled: () => {
        return gs.getProperty(Constants.PROPS.INBOUND_API_ENABLED) === "true" ? true : false;
    },

    validateRequestPayload: (data, payloadFields = []) => {
        let errorsFound = [];
        let result = {
            has_error: false,
            error_message: ""
        };
        try {
            if (!Utils.isInboundAPIEnabled()) {
                result.has_error = true;
                result.error_message = "The SCC Integration is turned off in ServiceNow";
                return result;
            }
            if (gs.nil(data) || Object.keys(data).length === 0) {
                result.has_error = true;
                result.error_message = "The request body is not present or has no properties at all";
                return result;
            }
            payloadFields.forEach((name) => {
                if (!data.hasOwnProperty(name) || !data[name] || gs.nil(data[name])) {
                    errorsFound.push(name);
                }
            });
            if (errorsFound.length === 1) {
                result.has_error = true;
                result.error_message = `The attribute ${errorsFound} is not not present or blank in the request body`;
            } else if (errorsFound.length > 1) {
                result.has_error = true;
                result.error_message = `The following attributes are not present or blank in the request body: ${errorsFound.join(
                    ", "
                )}`;
            }
        } catch (error) {
            result.has_error = true;
            result.error_message = error;
        }
        return result;
    }

};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Lucas.Guerino@crossfuze.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-01 15:19:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>01e139acfb05da5048a7f92abeefdce8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Utils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SCC Integration" source="x_tipts_scc_integr">181e4d68fb81da5048a7f92abeefdcb0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SCC Integration">181e4d68fb81da5048a7f92abeefdcb0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_01e139acfb05da5048a7f92abeefdce8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Lucas.Guerino@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-01 15:33:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
